content.task:
Design enterprise feature integration architecture for Priority 4 PIVOT:

CRITICAL PIVOT: Convert 18 "orphaned" modules into integrated enterprise features

HIGH-VALUE ENTERPRISE MODULES IDENTIFIED:
üîê **Security Tier** (3,047 lines of enterprise security):
- stellar_vault_integration.py (748 lines) - HashiCorp Vault for enterprise key management
- stellar_hardware_wallets.py (712 lines) - Ledger/Trezor hardware wallet integration  
- stellar_security_hardening.py (829 lines) - Production security controls & threat mitigation
- stellar_security_metrics.py (758 lines) - Security monitoring & compliance reporting

üí∞ **DeFi/Trading Tier** (2,263 lines of business logic):
- stellar_liquidity_management.py (1,147 lines) - Advanced liquidity management algorithms
- stellar_yield_farming.py (1,116 lines) - DeFi yield optimization strategies

üîß **Infrastructure Tier** (Supporting modules):
- stellar_test_account_manager.py, stellar_load_testing.py, stellar_performance_optimizer.py
- Plus 9 other infrastructure modules

ARCHITECTURE REQUIREMENTS:
- Design modular plugin/feature activation system
- Create enterprise configuration framework
- Establish feature dependency management
- Design backwards-compatible integration approach
- Follow stellar_sdex_tdd_v3.md enterprise patterns
- Ensure production-ready activation/deactivation

Deliver comprehensive integration architecture with implementation roadmap.
content.context: MAJOR PIVOT: Found $2M+ worth of enterprise features incorrectly classified as "orphaned". Need to convert these into production-ready integrated capabilities following enterprise architecture patterns.
